alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Hubbard; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hubbard, northwestern Wadena, northeastern Otter Tail and southeastern Becker Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Butler, or 22 miles east of Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wadena, Menahga, New York Mills, Sebeka, Bluffton, Nimrod and Wolf Lake. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
